name: Droid Invasion (HorizonZz)
description:
DROID INVASION

You are a soldier that has been ordered to the moon to guard the core after all the scientists working on it have been turned into zombies by killer robots! Will you survive your mission?

Game volume is changeable in the controls tab or the pause menu.

Mouse sensitivity can be changed in the pause menu.

Leave any questions below, enjoy!

Credits

Art and Coding by Deep Blue Studio.

Music by @Geri Art, @1tamara2 & @wisconsinpictures.
